PointsFromSin3D.code:
class PointsFromSin3D:
    def __init__(self, freq, amp, phase, start, end, n):
        import numpy as np
        freq = float(freq) * np.pi * 2
        amp = float(amp)
        phase = float(phase) * 6.28
        start = float(start) * 6.28
        end = float(end) * 6.28
        n = int(n)
        points = []
        for i in range(n):
            u = start + i / (float(n)-1)
            v = amp * np.sin(freq * u + phase)
            p = [u, v]
            points.append(p)
        self.points = points
